title: The arte of gunnerie. Wherein is set foorth a number of seruiceable secrets, and practical conclusions, belonging to the art of gunnerie, by arithmeticke skill to be accomplished: both pretie, pleasant, and profitable for all such as are professors of the same facultie. / Compiled by Thomas Smith of Barwicke vpon Tweed souldier.
author: Smith, Thomas, fl. 1600-1627.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for VVilliam Ponsonby,
